function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Close proximity of food trucks at local events increases the risk of disease transmission.","Impact":"Potential for widespread transmission of contagious diseases in the community.","Mitigation":"Implement strict sanitation and hygiene protocols for food preparation and service.","Technologies":"Use of UV-C disinfection technology for food preparation surfaces.","People":"Customers, staff, and attendees at local events.","Owner":"Food truck operators and event organizers."},{"Description":"Limited dining options at the local university due to construction may lead to overcrowding and increased risk of disease transmission.","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease transmission among university students and staff.","Mitigation":"Implement crowd control measures and enforce strict sanitation and hygiene protocols at alternative dining locations.","Technologies":"Use of contactless payment systems to reduce physical interactions during transactions.","People":"University students, staff, and construction workers.","Owner":"Local university administration and food service providers."}]}
